title: The One With the Prom Video

questions.question: What does Joey give to Chandler as a gift?
questions.correct_answer: A gold bracelet
questions.explanation: Joey gives Chandler a gold bracelet as a token of their friendship.

questions.question: What is Monica interviewing for at the beginning of the episode?
questions.correct_answer: A job at a restaurant
questions.explanation: Monica is interviewing for a job at a restaurant, where she is asked to make a salad.

questions.question: What does Phoebe claim is a known fact about lobsters?
options: They fall in love and mate for life
questions.correct_answer: They fall in love and mate for life
questions.explanation: Phoebe claims that lobsters fall in love and mate for life, which she uses to describe Ross and Rachel's relationship.

questions.question: Why does Ross intervene in Rachel's conversation with another man at Central Perk?
options: Because he is trying to protect Rachel
Because he wants to join the conversation
Because he wants to order a coffee
questions.correct_answer: Because he is jealous
questions.explanation: Ross intervenes in Rachel's conversation because he is jealous of the other man and wants to assert his own interest in Rachel.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's nose being bandaged?
options: She had a deviated septum corrected
questions.correct_answer: She had a deviated septum corrected
questions.explanation: Rachel's nose is bandaged because she had a deviated septum corrected, which required surgery.

questions.question: What does Chandler call the gold bracelet that Joey gave him?
options: The eyesore from the Liberace house of crap
questions.correct_answer: The woman repeller
questions.explanation: Chandler jokingly refers to the gold bracelet as the 'woman repeller' because it seems to scare off women.

questions.question: Why does Ross's mother suggest that he take Rachel to the prom?
options: Because Rachel doesn't have a date
Because Ross doesn't have a date
Because Ross's mother wants to see them together
Because Rachel's parents are getting divorced
questions.correct_answer: Because Rachel doesn't have a date
questions.explanation: Ross's mother suggests that he take Rachel to the prom because Rachel doesn't have a date and his mother wants to see them together.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Ross plays on the keyboard in the prom video?
questions.correct_answer: Axel-F
questions.explanation: Ross plays the song 'Axel-F' on the keyboard in the prom video, which is a reference to the song from the movie 'Beverly Hills Cop'.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the group when they watch the prom video and see Ross's afro and mustache?
questions.correct_answer: They are amused and laugh
questions.explanation: The group is amused and laughs when they see Ross's afro and mustache in the prom video.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross's decision to take Rachel to the prom?
questions.correct_answer: Rachel kisses Ross
questions.explanation: Ross's decision to take Rachel to the prom leads to Rachel kissing him, which suggests that she has developed feelings for him.

questions.question: What does Monica's mother say to her when she is watching the rest of the prom video?
questions.correct_answer: Dance with him
questions.explanation: Monica's mother tells her to dance with her father while they are watching the prom video.

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: The group watching the prom video
Monica and Rachel talking about their dates
questions.correct_answer: Monica's parents under the covers
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode shows Monica's parents under the covers, which is a humorous and unexpected ending to the episode.

questions.question: What does Joey say when Chandler insults the gold bracelet?
options: If you hated the bracelet so much, you should have just said so
I don't care what you think
I'm going to take it back
questions.correct_answer: If you hated the bracelet so much, you should have just said so
questions.explanation: Joey is upset when Chandler insults the gold bracelet and tells him that he should have just said so if he didn't like it.

questions.question: Why does Chandler apologize to Joey?
options: Because he insulted the gold bracelet
Because he lost the gold bracelet
Because he didn't like the gold bracelet
Because he wanted to make fun of Joey
questions.correct_answer: Because he insulted the gold bracelet
questions.explanation: Chandler apologizes to Joey because he insulted the gold bracelet, which was a gift from Joey.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she sees the gold bracelet on Chandler's wrist?
options: She laughs and makes fun of it
She is jealous of the bracelet
She thinks it's a nice gift
questions.correct_answer: She thinks it's a nice gift
questions.explanation: Phoebe thinks that the gold bracelet is a nice gift from Joey to Chandler and doesn't understand why Chandler is making fun of it.

questions.question: What does Ross's father say to him when he is trying to decide whether to take Rachel to the prom?
options: You're a college man, you can take her to the prom
You're too young to take her to the prom
You should take her to the prom because you're a nice guy
You should take her to the prom because you're a college man
questions.correct_answer: You should take her to the prom because you're a college man
questions.explanation: Ross's father tells him that he should take Rachel to the prom because he is a college man and it would be a good opportunity for him to spend time with her.

questions.question: What is Monica's reaction to seeing her old self in the prom video?
options: I was so skinny back then
I was so fat back then
I had a great time at the prom
I wish I could go back to that time
questions.correct_answer: I was so fat back then
questions.explanation: Monica is surprised and a little embarrassed to see her old self in the prom video, and she comments on how much weight she has lost since then.
